name: CoffeeShop
description: HTML & CSS (Sass) landing page. Design provided by BrainStation.

name: BandSite
description: HTML & CSS (Sass), functionality provided with vanilla JavaScript DOM methods.

name: PokeMart
description: My first hackathon for BrainStation. The only requirement was that we use an API. This frontend application connects to the pokeAPI and uses its data to make a little poke-store.

name: BrainFlix
description: Mock video website created for styling/design purposes - React client and Node/Express backend. Styled with Sass. Mind the slow startup - it's hosted on Heroku for free, so it sometimes goes to sleep due to inactivty. Just takes a few seconds to wind back up.

name: East Vancouver Radio
description: This is an internet radio app: it consists of an Express server streaming music to a React client and if you also have the user/password combo you can upload or delete mp3s from the client-side. My friends made some mixes that I keep hosted on there. There's also a chat application handled by MongoDB and socket.io - feel free to say "hello"!

name: InStock
description: This is a basic inventory management application, created with React, Express & Knex (connected to a MySQL database). Styled with Sass.

name: DevJobs
description: Mock job site created with React. Mind the slow startup but make sure to check out the light & dark modes, as well as the fully responsive layout (mobile, tablet & desktop views).

name: Shortly
description: Landing page connected to an API where users can generate shorter URLs to share. Built in React and styled with styled-components. Fully responsive: it includes mobile, tablet & desktop views.
